description: The creamy and lightly salted goats cheese balances well with the tangy dressing and beetroot.
keywords: Greek salad,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Sesame free,Beetroot
name: Beetroot & Goats Cheese Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 160g goats cheese, cut into small cubes
300g mixed salad leaves, washed and drained
1 medium red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the cooked beetroot into small bite size portions.
Combine all ingredients in a bowl and ensure the wet ingredients are mixed well throughout before serving.
